lead_paragraph: Three Swedish tourists visiting Rio for the Olympics were briefly abducted by armed men after stopping near a dangerous slum to take photos, but were released unharmed, police said Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Three Swedish Tourists Abducted in Rio Slum, Released Unharmed
headline.main: Three Swedish Tourists Abducted in Rio Slum, Released Unharmed
